HOME.TITLE: Welcome to AfyaHub
HOME.ABOUT: Your digital gateway to seamless healthcare.

ITEM1.TITLE: Welcome to AfyaHub
ITEM1.SUBTITLE: Your digital gateway to seamless healthcare—find trusted clinics, book appointments, and manage your health journey all in one place.

ITEM2.TITLE: Book Appointments
ITEM2.SUBTITLE: Schedule visits with top-rated clinics and experienced practitioners at your convenience, directly through AfyaHub.

ITEM3.TITLE: Discover Nearby Clinics
ITEM3.SUBTITLE: Explore our network of certified clinics in your area and choose the best care for you and your family.

ABOUT.TITLE: About AfyaHub
ABOUT.TEXT: AfyaHub is your one-stop portal for seamless access to clinic services, appointment scheduling, and healthcare resources. Discover trusted clinics, connect with expert practitioners, and take charge of your health journey with ease and confidence.

HEADER.TITLE: Our Services
HEADER.SUBTITLE: Explore the full suite of offerings on AfyaHub—designed to simplify access to quality healthcare, whether you need a quick consultation or a comprehensive wellness plan.

ITEMS.TITLE: Online Consultation
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Connect with a certified clinician from anywhere for non-emergency advice and follow-ups.

ITEMS.TITLE: Clinic Appointments
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Find and book slots at partnered clinics across multiple specialties near you.

ITEMS.TITLE: Health Packages
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Choose from a range of screening and wellness packages tailored to your needs.

ITEMS.TITLE: Lab Services
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Order lab tests online and get sample collection at home with quick digital reports.

ITEMS.TITLE: Health Records
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Access and share your consolidated medical records anytime through your dashboard.

ITEMS.TITLE: Wellness Programs
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Join personalized wellness and lifestyle programs curated by our experts.

HEADER.TITLE: AfyaHub News
HEADER.SUBTITLE: Stay up to date with the latest clinic openings, health tips, and AfyaHub announcements to help you navigate your care journey.

ITEMS.TITLE: New Specialty Clinic Opens in Riyadh
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: AfyaHub welcomes its latest cardiology clinic located in the heart of Riyadh.

ITEMS.TITLE: AfyaHub Launches Telehealth Services
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Connect with board-certified doctors from home—our new telehealth feature goes live this month.

ITEMS.TITLE: 5 Tips for Staying Healthy This Summer
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Keep cool and safe with these practical health tips from AfyaHub’s expert clinicians.

section3.title: Section 3
